nodes.text: The Pygmy Torton Cave was a cave southeast of the city of Narmle on the Nabooian moon Rori. It was populated by pygmy tortons.

A female torton which growth was naturally stunted from birth once found her way into this cave. She found it a suitable environment to lay eggs and gave rise to the the impressive pack of tortons that later inhabited the cave. Many years later, during the Galactic Civil War, rumors said that the matriach still lived in the cave. A biologist published an article about the cave on the HoloNet by the time of the Battle of Yavin.
Circa 1 ABY, a spacer visited the cave and found the weapon known as Darstai'is Sickle.

The Pygmy Torton Cave was a location in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Pygmy Torton Cave was added to the game with the "Publish 1" update, released on August 3, 2003.
